General.Name: Tungsten West PLC
General.Description: Tungsten West PLC operates as a mining company in the United Kingdom. It owns and operates a Hemerdon tungsten and tin mine located near the village of Plympton, in Devon, England. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 60 Gracechurch Street, London, United Kingdom, EC3V 0HR

0.Name: Mr. Mark Edward Thompson B.A. (Hons.), M.A.
0.Title: Exec. Vice-Chairman
